alert.note: Alert for Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 9:16PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Stanley County through 1000 PM MDT... At 915 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Hayes, or 24 miles west of Fort Pierre, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Stanley County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
